text: Pen chɨn nopun, mubwak chɨn mɨñɨl lum awl mɨdeb ak, sel kal tek mɨdeb. Pen kal anɨb ak tɨg wanɨgel akaŋ, wul lɨl yapek, God kal chɨnop kɨdeyɨl pel pelnep yenɨgab olap ñɨnɨgab. Kal anɨb ak God man ne alaŋ yenɨgab ak, bɨ okok kɨli ma gɨnɨgabal, God ne ke gɨlɨnɨgab.5.1 Sel kal lum awl yɨl anɨb ak, mubwak chɨn lum awl ak takaw paladaŋ lɨl agup. Pen kal kɨdeyɨl ak, mubwak chɨn kɨdeyɨl nɨb ak God man ne alaŋ dɨnɨgabun ak takaw paladaŋ lɨl agup.
